# Technology Tips

## In Zoom

- Camera should be on
- In the main room:
    - To answer question, unmute (by holding spacebar)
- In breakout rooms:
    - Microphone can stay unmuted
- Don't full-screen Zoom

## In a Browser
- Keep each link in a different tab
- Keep an eye out for notices from Zoom
